#LatinChain #Welcome 📜
Hi. Welcome to LatinChain Platform (Games from Latin America for Pi). Increase your Pi cryptocurrency mining power using this app. If you don't have it yet, download Pi Browser on App Store or Play Store to watch it working.
Pi Hackathon winners
Last 24 hours:
Users
Tasks
Today's tasks
Donate in one touch
Play Chess
Play Sudoku
Play Snake
Watch Pi Rewarded Ads
Use Cool Apps
Play Other Games
Use Utilities
Wallet
All prize payments will be paid automatically to your Pi Wallet associated in your Pi Browser.
Here you can watch your incoming and outgoing transactions:
Transactions
Transactions list
Read the Rules to know the prize payment amount:
Rules
Rules and Knowledge base
LatinChain dSocial (conf)
Hello, are you Youtuber or want to become one?. Now you can stream your videos on LatinChain Platform. Set your Youtube streaming video here and click in Save, play, win and then it will be watched on Winners Board and Top 50 streamers (LatinChain dSocial):
Save
Place your own Youtube video url in the text box above. You can use Normal video, Live transmission or Short.
A Youtube video URL looks like this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9KqcyAoCZzo
A Youtube live video URL looks like this:
https://www.youtube.com/live/AXOtWxSETew?si=3bKFA_mjb0ethVqe
A Youtube short video URL looks like this:
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/SZEljmi-wr4
Lost a transaction?
Hello, did you lost a transaction?. Now you can register your transaction. Set your Memo ID or Payment ID here and click in Save. You can find your Memo ID or Payment ID by accessing to TXID link in Pi Blockexplorer:
Save
Place your Memo ID or Payment ID in the text box above.
A Memo ID or Payment ID looks like this:
WVV68I9Nz2VGHoWUV9mH3P5Te8Dn
